column4: "Na hom rusuasua nsɛm mfir araa ma ekodu dabɛn? Hom ndwen ho

column2: "Ebɛnadze ntsi na ibu hɛn dɛ mbowa
column3: Na yɛayɛ dɛ akwasampafo wɔ w'enyi do yi?"

column2: "Ɔwo a etsetsew woho gu wɔ w'ebufuw mu
column3: Aso wɔbɔpow asaase wɔ wo ntsi? Anaa wobotutu abotan efi n'ananmu?"
Na ne kandzea edum wɔ no do."
Na nankasa n'apam ahwe no ase."

column2: "Na nankasa n'anan dze no akɔtoto eboa mu

column3: Na efir ata esuo no mu."

column2: "Wɔdze ahoturoho efir ehuntsa no wɔ famu
column3: Na woesua no apafir wɔ kwan mu."
Na mbusu ayɛ krado ama ne ngyinae."

column2: "Wobotu no efi n'asesee a no werɛ hyɛ mu no mu; Na wɔdze no abrɛ hu hen no."
"Wɔdze sɔfee bɛtsew ne tsenabew: Na nyia ɔnnyɛ nedze mu bi na ɔbɛtsena n'asesee mu."
column3: "#18.15 SƆFEE: Kan no nna wɔdze sɔfee tsew dan a ifun ada mu no ho."
Na orinnya dzin wɔ abɔntsen do."

column2: "Wɔbɛpam no efi kan mu akɔ sum mu
"Onnkenya ba na banana so wɔ ne manmu
column3: Nkyii so onnkenya kyirkafo biara wɔ mbrɛ ɔkɛtsenae no."

column2: "Hɔn a wobefi anee no hɔn ho bɔbow hɔn wɔ ne da no ho
column3: Dɛ mbrɛ hɔn a wofii boka no nketsenketse kyeer hɔn no."
Na yi nye nyia onnyim Nyankopɔn no ne gyinabew."
